Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey and red in section, the interior is slightly grooved and spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of three lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393775) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393775)
